answers.answer: Delayed ejaculation very often is due to some medication or drug either prescribed or recreational being used currently or used sometime in the past. Can you reflect on that for a while and see what you come up with?

First of all, I would like to thank you for taking your time to help me.I only take antibiotic if I have a cold for maybe two days.and Panadol if I have bad Headache.that's it, I don't take any drugs and didn't take any for more than 6 years.the only thing I can think of is that I drink a lot of ginger about 8 cups a day for about 3 years nowalso,I'm a heavy smoker

If it takes 15 minutes for you to ejaculate, your sex partner may well prefer that to your stated goal of 3 to 5 minutes.  Also, are you self-mediating with antibiotics?  If those are necessary under a doctor's care, two days would not be sufficient time for them to work, with ten days being more likely.  Otherwise, those eight cups of ginger tea sounds extreme and may have a negative effect, unless you are treating certain symptoms.
I had a urethral stent put in for kidney stones why do I itch when I urinate

question: Hello,I'm 32 years old.I have problem with ejaculation. it takes me more than 15 minutes to ejaculate this is in sex or masturbation.this problem started about 2 years ago,before that I could ejaculate after 3-5 minutesalso, if I ejaculate before emptying my Bowel I get really hard burning sensation in my Penis for about 15 minutes.I tried not having sex for 3 weeks with no effect.also, I tested for Diabetes and I don't have itthank you and sorry if me English not good.
title: more than 15 minutes to ejaculate
